mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_T ( BOARD_NO , TITLE , CONTENTS , MODIFIED_AT , CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{title} , #{contents} , CURRENT_DATE , CURRENT_DATE )
mapper.select: SELECT RN, BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, MODIFIED_AT,CREATED_AT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NO ${sort}) AS RN, BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, MODIFIED_AT, CREATED_AT FROM BOARD_T) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
